entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:39 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
